title: ISic000522. I.Sicily inscription 000522
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) m(anibus)
Aeliae ((·)) Hilare
quae ((·)) vixit ((·)) an(nos)
XXVII ((·)) m(enses) ((·)) VIIII
5dies ((·)) IIII
P(ublius) ((·)) Aelius ((·)) Eutych͡es
filiae ((·)) pientissumae
sepulchrum ((·)) fec(it)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the spirits of the dead. To Aelia Hilara, who lived for 27 years, 9 months and 4 days. Publius Aelius Eutyches made this sepulchre for his most dutiful daughter.

Italian translation

Agli spiriti dei defunti. A Aelia Hilaria, che visse 27 anni, 9 mesi e 4 giorni. Publius Aelius Eutyche fece questo sepolcro per la devotissima figlia.

commentary

bibliography

    10.7242 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
